src_original: idānīṃ nirdeśôcyate /  tatra kṣāntis trividhā dharmasaṃgītisūtre 'bhihitā /
tatra duṣkhâdhivāsanakṣāntivipakṣo 'niṣṭâgamaprāptaduṣkhabhīrutā /  iṣṭavighātaprāptaś ca sukhâbhiṣvaṅgas tābhyāṃ daurmanasyaṃ /
anavadhikalpâbaddhadṛḍhavaireṣu kleśaśatruṣu prahartum utsāho duṣkhasahanaṃ vā na bhavet /  viśeṣatas tribhuvanavijayayā baddhaparikarasya māraśavarapratigṛhītajagadbandimokṣāya saṃgrāmayataḥ /
yathā câbhyāsavaśāt satvānāṃ duṣkhasukhasa/mjñā /  tathā sarvaduṣkhôtpādeṣu sukhasaṃjñā pratyupasthānâbhyāsāt sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupatiṣṭhate /
etan niṣyandaphalaṃ ca sarvadharmasukhâkrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratila-  [ Cambridge MS f86b ---> ]
yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisatvaḥ sarvârambaṇavastuṣu sukhām eva vedanāṃ vedayate /

tasya nairayikām api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /  mānuṣīm api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya hasteṣv api chidyamāneṣu pādeṣv api karṇeṣv api nāsāsv api sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
vetrair api tāḍyamānasyârddhavetrair api kaśābhir api tāḍyamānasya sukhasaṃ-
[ Bendall ed p182 ---> ]  jñâiva pravartate bandhanâgāreṣv api praks.iptasya //

tailapācikaṃ vā kriyamāṇasya /  ikṣukuṭṭitavad vā kuṭṭhyamānasya /  naḍacippitikaṃ vā cipyamānasya tailapradyotikaṃ vâdīpyamānasya sarpiḥpradyotikaṃ vā dadhipradyotikaṃ vâdīpyamānasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
